title: How do I attach screenshots? (trying to ban a troll)
body:
I have a serious troll I got in my game, I made some screenshots but I can't add them in... I spent an hour looking up how to do this (IM NOT TRYING TO DO IMGUR), the screenshots are in my files, and when I drag and drop them into the body section of the 'create a discussion' it just makes another tab with a link like "file:///C:/Users/UserName1234/Pictures/troll.PNG"

someone please help, this guy needs perm ban.

replies.body: If you are trying to report a player, you need to send a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to Riot Support. If you are unable to drag and drop files into the ticket, try to click and upload the screenshots in your ticket.

Alright, problem is, they need a "Match history or website link" of the game... I wasn't in the game at all, luckily someone left the pre-game/champ select lobby. Do they need this link to actually ban or no? I literally have like 5 screenshots of his messages in the pre-game chat and I'm sure you can look up his match history: his name is <Removed by Moderation>...

Generally, screenshots used as proof can speed up the punishment process if the player is indeed trolling confirmed by the responding Rioter. Although, Riot can take a look at the chat logs themselves if necessary.
